page.title: 17BRANDON WOOD, COVENTRY.
page.content: Brandon Wood was in bad shape. A man decided to get a group together to reconstruct the wood. He called this group the{"Friends of Brandon Wood". There are many members, and householders can join for the sum of 50p. A few of the members meet in the wood every Sunday morning. They can go when they want to. They have built bridges, cleared paths and re_established ponds. They have also made ditches and good drainage systems,which all help in case of fire. Horses and motorbikes sometimes get through the fences that have been put up. The group don't like this because they churn up all the mud.
